title: Wardrobe Doors With Stiles, Overhead And Base Boards, 18th century
description: a, b) double doors with curved top, each with three inset assymetrically curved panels (a) with attached fluted center stile; 3 metal hinges on each door and metal securing rod and mechanism on back of (a); c, d) fluted stiles and each with 3 hinges; e) curved overhead entablature; f) curved underpiece of entablature with vertical fluting and centered  7-pointed star inlaid in green, red, and natural woods; g) base board, partly modern.

type.name: Wardrobe doors with stiles, overhead and base boards

tombstone.epitaph: Wardrobe Doors With Stiles, Overhead And Base Boards, 18th century.Fruitwood, metal. 1969-12-1-a/f.
